thread.title: How will I spend R1 ,00?
thread.title_full: How will I spend R1 ,00? | News24

author: news24.com
title: How will I spend R1 ,00?
text:
I used to dream big about my career, because the life wasn't always just right, I would like to making my future bright, How? I would start to go further with my education to fulfill my dream. As a young creative , gifted , and business minded girl I would start my own small business also .We grown up under deferent situations some of the others they don't have place to stay nobody taking care of them so I can take a share of 10% to (NGOs) that is Non Governmental organization .Then as a poor young girl but a single parent experiencing hard times ,hurts and suffered for so long time ago investment for the next future would be needed to change these matters I have been experiencing .
I hope my story is relevant for you
kind regard
Phakama Ms.
